item.title: A Brief Summary of Networking in iOS
item.description: A Brief Summary of Networking in iOS I was reading materials regarding iOS networking and taking notes while reading, this article is a summary of all the materials I’ve read so far. It’s not a complete summary of networking or iOS, so you should not rely purely on this article to learn from scratch; However, having said this, you may find this article useful if you are already familiar with iOS and/or networking.
